    <facet>

      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15407</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="it">Esercizio di abbinamento sui dieci paesi che hanno aderito all'UE il 1 Maggio 2004</string>
            <string language="en">Matching Task on the 10 countries that joined the EU on May 1st, 2004</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammenpassende Aufgabe auf den 10 Ländern, die 
das EU an Mai 1. verbanden, 2004</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparier Chargent sur les 10 pays qui ont 
joint l'EU le 1er mai, 2004</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tarefa combinando nos 10 países que juntaram o EU
maio em 1o, 2004</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταιριάζοντας με στοιχειώδης εργασία στις 10 χώρες που 
προσχώρησαν στην ΕΕ σε Μάιος 1$ος, το 2004</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarea que corresponde con en los 10 países que 
ensamblaron el EU 1 de mayo de 2004</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="it">Dieci ulteriori paesi hanno aderito all'Unione Europea il 1 Maggio 2004. Sapete a quali di loro appartengono queste bandiere?</string>
            <string language="en">Ten more countries joined the European Union on May 1st, 2004.
Do you know which countries these national flags belong to?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="it">bandiera</string>
            <string language="en">flag</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">10 weitere Länder verbanden den europäischen 
Anschluß an Mai 1., 2004.Do, das Sie wissen, welchen Ländern diese 
nationalen Markierungsfahnen gehören?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dix pays supplémentaires ont joint l'union 
européenne le 1er mai, 2004.Do que vous connaissez à quels pays ces 
indicateurs nationaux appartiennent ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dez mais países juntaram a união européia maio 
em 1o, 2004.Do que você sabe que países estas bandeiras nacionais 
pertencem?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δέκα περισσότερες χώρες προσχώρησαν στην Ευρωπαϊκή 
Ένωση σε Μάιος 1$ος, 2004.Do που ξέρετε ποιες χώρες αυτές 
οι εθνικές σημαίες ανήκουν;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Diez más países ensamblaron la unión europea 
de mayo el 1, 2004.Do que usted sabe qué países pertenecen estos 
indicadores nacionales?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Markierungsfahne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">indicateur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bandeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σημαία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">indicador</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
